Akvo.org | Data intern | Amsterdam | INTERN | ONSITE

Akvo is looking for a data management and analysis intern for a period of six â€“ eight months, preferably starting in August 2017. This is an opportunity to gain practical experience working in a purpose-driven organisation. You will work on various data analysis projects, such as: looking at which investments in water infrastructure are most effective; and how data can best be combined and presented to be useful for data-driven decision making.

Akvo Foundation builds open source software that we run as a service for several dozen governments, UN organisations and hundreds of NGOs.
